# Writing my dissertation 

* Conducted three experiments combining in-person and online data-gathering techniques with over 600 participants.  
* Collected and analyzed the data produced
by these experiments. Incorporated those findings into my dissertation manuscript.  
* Presented preliminary results of the first experiment at LSRL50.    
* Presented results of the second experiment at LSRL51.
